attributes.action: Debate the Impact of Medicine Shortages on Patients, Pharmacies, and GPs
attributes.additional_details: Have robust arrangements with the EU so that medicines can flow to the UK.
attributes.background: Brexit has caused untold harm to many patients, pharmacies and General Practice since 2016. The UK needs to have a medicines industry which is part of the wider European one.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
